ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: DDD worthless?  How would you change it?
ygData.msgSnippet: I think it s clear from the contradictory posts here that a lot of people HAVE put thought into this and don t agree that 400 damage is appropriate for the
ygData.messageBody:
I think it's clear from the contradictory posts here that a lot of people
HAVE put thought into this and don't agree that 400 damage is appropriate
for the mobs that higher level bards would feel. Also a desire for a single
targeted spell as opposed to targeted AOE...

Slyde
-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Monday, March 05, 2001 2:56 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: DDD worthless? How would you change it?

At 12:44 PM 3/5/01 -0600, you wrote:
>Okay - but the issue remains: How many people OTHER than Whee DON'T think
>that DDD is useless?

or this question: How many people have actually thought about the song and
possible ways
that it is useful?

30 seconds of ''cost'' time to get 400+ damage every 30 minutes or so seems
fairly useful to me.
